name: French Cade & Lavender Glass Jar Candle
about: Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody..Scent Type: Citrus & Woods..Key Notes: French Cade Wood, Verbena, Bulgarian Lavender..Burn Time: Up to 140 hours..Fragrance Description: This rustic and herbaceous candle fills the room with an aromatic infusion of lush lavender, rare French cade wood, and vivid lemon verbena, transporting you to the sun-drenched Provence region. It helps you unwind with refreshing and calming energy, like a cool breeze on a summer day...About the Candle: Voluspa's clean-burning coconut wax blend is hand-poured into an embossed glass jar and topped with a lid that keeps the candle dust-free when not in use. The candle lasts for up to 140 hours of burn time. Voluspa candles are also designed and hand-poured in the USA and feature 100 percent natural wicks.
ingredients: Coconut Oil 84836-98-6, Benzyl Benzoate 120-51-4, 2-T-Butylcyclohexyl Oxybutanol 139504-68-0, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydr Onaphthalenes 54464-57-2, Linalool 78-70-6, 2,6-Dimethyl-7-Octen-2-Ol 18479-58-8, Musk Ketone 81-14-1, Butylphenyl Methylpropional 80-54-6, Linalyl Acetate 115-95-7, Ethyl Trimethylcyclop Entene Butenol 28219-61-6, Hexyl Cinnamal 101-86-0, Ethyl Linalool 10339-55-6, Limonene 5989-27-5, Acetylcedrene 32388-55-9.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Trim wicks to one-quarter inch with each burn. .-Place candle on candle's lid, which doubles as a candle holder.-Allow wax to melt to the candle’s edge with each burn to prevent tunnelling..-Stop burning your candle when less than one-quarter inch of wax remains..-Upcycle your empty vessel to create a keepsake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great candle. smells aquatic to me, kinda like a men's cologne. voluspa are the best for a long, clean burn time. my first time with this fragrance. nice & fresh scent but doesn't fill up the room like my other voluspa candles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell, it burns well, its not overwhelming just nice and fresh but apparent for sure. Great size too and very pretty glass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Voluspa candles are either a hit or a miss, and this is a big miss.  I can't smell any aroma at all when burning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this candle. I always light it in the evening and it transports me to a beautiful French dreamy garden. Lovely clean scent that burns evenly and is heavenly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great scent! Sophisticated and clean. Love walking into a room with this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Romantic and clean. I love the beautiful glass jar, and that it can be reused after its burned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect mix of vanilla sweetness and the light airy smell of lavendar. perfect for a spring day!

Such a classic. This scent is great year round. I love to unwind with this burning at the end of the day since it’s woodsy and earthy. It’s a perfect gift for the men in my life as well with the color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this candle is like a breath of fresh air, filling my space with a serene and calming ambiance. The blend of French cade wood, verbena, and Bulgarian lavender is reminiscent of a tranquil garden in the countryside of South of France. Lighting this candle in the evening helps me unwind and find a moment of peace.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lavender is a staple in my household! Whether it's a candle or in a soap, I love the soothing smell and it just brings such a great vibe whenever I burn it. The glass holder is so cute and the size is good if you want to try Voluspa candles for the first time. Totally recommend 😎

reviews.review_title: For the Lavender Lovers Out There!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This candle was lovely and is the perfect gift for every lavender lover on the planet!  French Cade Lavender is an amazing scent that features heavy blends of lavender and sage notes combined with a strong hint of vanilla and floral musk. This candle has a powerful initial punch, but upon lighting it simmers down in a room and comfortably nestles into the space. Perfect for spring, French Cade Lavender is a wonderful scent that allows you to let the fresh air in, without even cracking a window.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely lovely candle. Not a bad price for the size. The scent isn’t too powerful but it’s definitely there and fills the room. The jar is more beautiful in person. It’s fresh and reminds me of spring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly refreshing scent.  Makes me feel like I'm being embraced by lavender.  Love that the greenish tone of the glass mirrors the scent of the candle.  It smells very much like being in nature and I adore that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always get so many compliments when I burn this signature scent. It's woodsy and a tad bit masculine, but in a good way! Staple in my home :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite fragrances from Voluspa — so clean and light
Terrific Scent, love this as a room refresher. Fills the room with very relaxing and therapeutic aromas.
Hands down my favorite scent from Voluspa. I’ll take it in any size at any time. This particular size makes it perfect for a small space!
My favorite Voluspa scent! I'm usually not a lavender fan, but this one isn't strong and is a sophisticated scent. Also this is the perfect size for a bedroom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty and soft scent. More of a clean & fresh scent  with a hint of lavender than a true lavender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the size and color of the jar. The scent is perfect for a fresh, relaxing vibe you'd like for the bathroom or in the bedroom on your nightstand.

It's the ultimate combination of rustic charm and soothing vibes, as the refreshing, yet calming lavender comes together to create an aroma that instantly transports you to a state of relaxation. Plus, the sleek glass jar adds a touch of elegance to any space while showcasing the warm glow of the flame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, this candle is in the cutest jar. Perfect size for a bedroom or bathroom. The lavender is a light relaxing scent that I usually use in my bathroom for a calming bath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go-to scent everywhere in my house! Fresh and clean are the two words that come to mind for French Cade lavender and the lavender creates a sense of warmth.
I love to use this one when my house is clean and ready for guests. It has a nice relaxing clean scent that is welcoming. The beautiful glass vessel makes for nice decoration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful scent! The lavender is so relaxing and calming, feels like you are transported to Provence. The jar is very elegant as well which is a bonus. This is a new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this candle, its beautiful! I have it in my bathrooms and it is a great scent to fill the room!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am normally not a fan of lavender-based scents, but this one is lovely. I also really like the color of the jar; it's such a beautiful green tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The candle smells as good as it looks. The size is perfect for my little bathroom. I highly recommend!
This candle definitely smells like my boyfriend's cologne.. so if you like the rustic and woodsy smell, this one is perfect! The lavender hint also makes it so it doesn't smell too earthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect gift size candle.  I love the gorgeous jar and the candle is just the right size for a smaller room.
Perfectly blended so the Lavendar is not overpowering. It's very calming and light but still fills my entire apartment. I love this scent after I've cleaned and in the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is my all time favorite for the kitchen or the restroom! The glass is one of my favorites because of the color! Once I’m done, I’ll be using it as a trinket jar !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent, it is in the most beautiful packaging.

I love this twist on a classic scent like lavender. With woody notes, this candle makes my room smell so cozy and fresh. The glass jar and label have a really classy design. This is my favorite new scent!
This is my favorite candle to light at the end of the day! I find it super soothing and relaxing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent gave me the feeling all my chores were complete and it was time to settle in for some well deserved rest and relaxation.  As always, the packaging is very well designed.  Details such as the pattern, color of glass, and even style of lid add to the overall value of the candle.  I’ve been a fan of Voluspa for quite some time, and this just proves that they continue to provide superior product in the fragrance/candle industry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The French Cade & Lavender candle has a soft, floral lavender scent that is not too strong or overpowering, and perfect for creating a calming atmosphere. The circular floral pattern of the clear glass jar and matching lid makes it an elegant piece of home decor.
Beautiful design on the glass of this candle. The fragrance throw is perfect for our home!

Voluspa's French Cade Lavender scent is absolutely to die for. Genuinely the best smelling candle I've ever had. The neutral translucent jar is perfect for any space. I currently have this at my desk and it keeps me relaxed throughout my work day without taking up too much room. Overall, I'm extremely happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mini from the Sephora favorites fragrance.... first of all it and smells like AXE!  and when I lit it it smelled like nothing and axe. thank God it was free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Based on all of these five star reviews, I must have gotten a dud. This candle doesn’t throw any scent at all. I’m really disappointed. I gave it two stars because the jar is beautiful and I hope to repurpose it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The French Cade Lavender candle is hands down the best scented candle I've ever had. The combination of French Cade Wood, Verbena, and Bulgarian Lavender creates a beautifully complex fragrance that's both refreshing and calming at the same time. The citrus notes in the candle are subtle, but add a nice twist to the woodsy and floral fragrances. The packaging is elegant and the quality of the candle is superb. I would definitely recommend this candle to anyone looking for a luxurious and unique scent to add to their collection. The French Cade Lavender candle is a must-have for any candle lover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this scent leans towards cologne more than a perfume if that makes sense. I love it but it is def for a dark evening moody vibe.

reviews.review_title: This candle puts me in the mood for spring!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It reminds me of the lavender farms I have visited. Such a perfect spring fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hint of lavender and a woodsy smell. My husband's favorite scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Substantial and luxurious, I love the fresh woodsie vibes it projects throughout my space.

reviews.review_title: Smells like a fancy french hotel room
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like what I imagine a fancy French hotel would smell like. Elevated, not expected, but a celebratory fancy version of everyday. Clean, but fragrant. I don’t think classic lavender scent comes to mind when I smell this at all, though. If you’re not a lavender person, but you are a fancy linen person, I think this could still be a good scent. But if you ARE a lavender person expecting this to smell exactly like such, I don’t think you’ll get that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best Lavender Candle Ever!  I gave this to a friend and her husband wanted to know what that scent was.  A man noticed and loved it.  I could burn 24/7 in every room!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A lovely and clean masculine scent. It smells like a light men's cologne, with a hint of lavender. The 5.5oz size fills up my apartment bedroom nicely with scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: super luxurious scent! I love to burn this in the evenings or when guests are coming over. makes your house smell so clean and nice
Got this along with a few others, love the glass look and the scent profile is great. The smell is a fit for anyone who loves lavender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This candle is wonderful! The scent is light and fresh but still prominent with a great throw that fills a room appropriately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lavender has become one of my favorite scents. This candle doesn't disappoint.  The calming fragrance is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the clean fresh scent of this French Cade and Lavender candle! It has a hint of the woods and is a wonderful and welcome scent year round. The jar is beautiful and looks white or clear with a hint of green that blends so well near any countertop plants.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This candle is very bright and great to keep a bathroom smelling beautiful. It's not too heavy, but more floraly scented. Love the lighter blue container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a calming scent, lavender is one of my favorites and it’s complimented so well by the vanilla

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so relaxing. I love to burn it while I'm in the bath - I can close my eyes and truly feel as if I am in a spa. I highly recommend!

French case is such a staple to me. It’s one of those fragrances that you can burn year round because it fits all seasons and makes the perfect house warming gift. This will forever be a top choice at Voluspa!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful jar, lovely fresh scent and clean burn A+++

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent even though I can sometimes be wary of lavender. It’s bright and airy — definitely reminds me of spring. I love the color of the glass vessel as well. It looks stunning in my space.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect spa scent! Has citrusy and woodsy tones and the jar is super cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My boyfriend loves this one. It's woodsy and clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent because it’s such a sophisticated lavender scent that doesn’t feel artificial. It truly does make you feel like you are in a lavender field in Provence. It’s the perfect spring candle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I spend quite a bit of time in my laundry room and while it is small, I choose to make the environment enjoyable.  French Cade Lavender is a scent that LOVE sitting on my counter with the lid off.  I will move it to our guest room to burn.  It is beautifully calm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love lavender. The aroma of this candle makes me think of being at an outdoor spa, giving me a tranquil feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with my French Cade Lavender body lotion from Voluspa, so I was SO excited to have the scent in candle form. It smells like a stack of fresh towels next to an open window on a warm spring day. I absolutely adore the jar, and plan on repurposing it for my Q tips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love lavender and I love this candle even more!! The scent is beautiful and so is the packaging. Bravo Voluspa!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would love to help you write a product review for VOLUSPA French Cade & Lavender Glass Jar Candle.  This candle is truly amazing! Not only is the scent a perfect blend of fresh lavender and sweet citrus, but it also burns incredibly clean and evenly. The glass jar adds a touch of elegance to any room and the burn time is impressive. You absolutely get your money's worth with this candle.  I also appreciate that VOLUSPA uses high-quality, natural ingredients in their candles, ensuring that they are not only beautiful but also better for you and the environment.  Overall, I highly recommend the VOLUSPA French Cade & Lavender Glass Jar Candle. It would make a fantastic gift for any candle-lover or a well-deserved treat for yourself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a lovely lavender scent, my brother loves this one! The smell definitely fills the room and everyone loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this candle! I love that this isn’t your typical lavender — their is a musky note to it while still making the air feel clean & refreshed. As always the fragrance throw on Voluspa candles goes such a long way, even with the smaller size!
The Lavender really comes out here and, as usual, the vessel is beautiful in my guest room.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely lavender scent. A voluspa classic. The lavender scent is so relaxing and the neural jar goes with any ascetic. A voluspa must have
Love love love this smell. Lavender is such a pretty, relaxing smell. I put this candle in my bathroom and it’s perfect. Fresh and clean smell! I highly recommend ☺️

reviews.review_title: The Classic. The Standard. The Go-To.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is a classic for a reason. French Cade Lavender IS Voluspa to me. I love it's stimulating, yet paradoxically relaxing scent in just about any room in my home. This is one that always makes a great gift (even when you're gifting yourself!) These candles burn so cleanly and for such a long time, that I just can't justify purchasing anything else.

This lavender scent is a Voluspa classic. It falls on the herb side of lavender- don’t think of overly scented room sprays. This candle captures the essence of a lavender flower field. There is a greenness to it. Voluspa always seems to fill their jars with the natural side of scents and this one is another great example.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This candle made my home smell amazing.It also was a very good value.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This candle smalls amazing and made my house cozy and comfortable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is nice when you smell the candle itself but doesn’t really fill the room at all when lit. The class container is pretty so it is disappointing that the scent is weak.

reviews.review_title: Throw is better the longer you burn it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The super mini size came in the 2022 Candle Sampler. I lit it a few times in my bathroom for an hour when I was getting ready, and didn’t get much of the scent unless I was over the top of it. However, I accidentally let it burn all day while I was at work and when I came home, my whole room smelled delightful without being overpowering. Not the candle I will get with my sampler coupon, but would make a great hostess gift or candle to light for a long party.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite candle of all time. I've bought for so many people as gifts and everyone loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and is subtle but strong smell and the bottle really elevates your decor

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, it isn’t too overwhelming but it does fill the space with the scent. I also love that the jar can be reused after since it it so pretty. Most of Voluspa’s candles are great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the third Voluspa scent type I've bought. I also own Vanilla Latte and Mokara. This particular one is my least favourite of the three because the scent smells more like a mens cologne than French Cade and Lavender - which is why I knocked off a star. You don't get much lavender or verbena but you do get a lot of cade wood in the scent. It has a decent throw but it takes a while burning for it to reach its full potential - so I would recommend it for smaller spaces. It reminds me a lot of Chanel Allure Homme, but a bit less sweet. It burns slower than Mokara but faster than my Vanilla Latte. Overall it's a good candle, very pretty, and honestly a nice scent, but the Cade Wood completely overpowers the other notes so it didn't live up to its claims.

reviews.review_title: More masculine than I would have liked...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the mini, burn time is slow so I can see the candle reaching the full 50 hrs. However, the candle burns -slightly- uneven. (I've attached a photo, if you look closely on the left side of the candle the wax has dissapeared completely, but on the right side of the jar there is wax not fully melted.)Asides from this the scent is subtle which I like. I find the longer you burn it, the stronger the scent becomes gradually. Filled my small living room and kitchen with no issues; scent wise I was dissapointed by the lack of lavendar. The scent leans more towards the masculine side as it is more woody. Looks beautiful when lit, can't wait to repurpose the jar. Not bad for the price but would reconsider a different scent for next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my 1st voluspa candle & I had pretty high hopes for it, but unfortunately this one is very underwhelming & not worth the price tag. I got this for my teeny tiny bedroom and it is a barely there smell that definitely doesn’t linger, or fill the room. I wish I would have picked a different scent in hindsight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product. The scent is nice, and the candle is not overwhelming when lit. The downside, is that I would say it's a little underwhelming when lit. The smell really doesn't go very far and it's very subtle, so it's definitely better for a small space, and even then will be subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite scent for my bedroom , such a clean scent. I also use the matching diffuser & reed diffuser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am very impressed with this candle! It only has 1 wick but burns pretty evenly. It’s more of a musky scent than lavender. Smells calming. The smell isn’t too strong, but still noticeable. Looking to buy more scents now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love the smell! Very long lasting :) recommend 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This candle is beautiful! Such a sexy, slightly masculine clean scent. This candle fills a room and smells lovely. And the packaging is gorgeous, super lux. I definitely will be repurchasing this candle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: smells like a mens cologne. something fresh and a little sexy.  its not a typical lavender at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a refreshing scent that fills the room without being overwhelming. I am very sensitive to scents and this candle did not cause me headaches or allergies. I will definitely be repurchasing and trying out their other products. It is absolutely a new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample version from the Sephora collection set. It had a strong scent only in the box, but when the candle was burning the scent was almost zero. Another thing is the fragrance itself. It reminds me of men's parfum and of Sephora Lagoon body lotion. I couldn't feel any lavender or vanilla there at all. Very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mini - there’s absolutely no scent when this candle is burning. My nose is very sensitive, so if I’m not smelling it, it’s not there. My husband agrees. Even when I leave the room for awhile and walk back in, nothing. Two stars for the pretty packaging.

reviews.review_title: Photo are incorrect on the Sephora website.
reviews.review_text: Great candle, but beware the photos on line are flipped. The smaller 5.5 ounce does not have a pretty patterned lid. Only the larger one does.

reviews.review_title: Strong enough for small room, clean product vibes.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells strong enough for a small room, gives me bougee cleaning product vibes. So I placed this candle in the bathroom..... My fav from voluspa is still santal vanille, perfect for my bedroom, subtle but strong enough. I like vanilla perfumed scent though, so that's also why.
This is my staple for a relaxing, calming bath after a hard week. It takes me back to when I visited France and the memories flooded back in such a lovely way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous candle with a delightful, light fragrance. The lavender is subtle but nice. Looks even more lovely when it’s burning. I’m not sure if it’s the formulation but I feel like it burned slightly faster than my other voluspa candles. But still so worth it! Their candles never disappoint, and look so lovely and chic in any room in your home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I looooved this candle, it burns so well! Voluspa has truly mastered the scent in this candle both hot and cold throw are amazing!
So fresh, smells like clean laundry! My entire family loves this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift in exchange for this honest review. This candle smells amazing and burns well. It smells clean and the scent is not overwhelming at all. It looks takes a while to fully burn the candle so it lasts long .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scented candle is so luxurious not only because of it's packaging that is super detailed with a beautiful pattern but the scent it's self it's a good strong throw when burned and makes my home smell fantastic

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok - if you are like me and were in middle school/high school during peak abercrombie and fitch - there is just something about a cologne-esque scent that you are drawn to. This is like the elevated version of walking by A&F and having your nostrils filled with that particular scent. It's not nearly as pungent (thankfully) but has a slight masculine undertone and slightly herbaceous that makes it such a great every day burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This volusoa its greatttt i love the scent and how it feels on my room i just can live without this scent anymore i feel calm and soft with these i would rebuy as soon as its over because i like it a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is amazing. It is earthy yet deep and rich. It is perfect for the bedroom because it is so cozy! Definitely going to be my go to winter scent.
I first need to say how STUNNING the packaging and glass is on this candle! It is so beautiful sitting out on the counter and is matched with a perfect scent as well

This is probably my favorite scent by Voluspa. It isn't like your typical Lavender scent. It's sophisticated and calming. Something about it reminds me of a cup of tea. Very warm and clean. And this candle burns forever!
Has an interesting fragrance that makes me feel like I'm at spa, so I placed it in my bathroom. Really elevates the space!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this scent. It’s my favorite fresh scent of all time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this candle, scent is not overpowering, very pleasant, even my husband and daughter love it! Also scent goes on for a while, compared to other brands, other brands change smell as soon as it’s lit. This one smells good longer! I highly recommend this brand! We love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent - it's light but still fills the entire space nicely. Not usually a fan of lavender but this candle made me change my mind!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: French Cade is the perfect candle to burn while relaxing in the bath. It’s clean and relaxing, creates a great home spa experience. Highly recommend!

This candle is such a fresh and bright candle, but also has the brisk smell as if you were walking into a spa. I like to have this type of smell in my bathroom, just gives the room a crisp fresh smell with in the tub, or showering. Great crisp lavender woodsy smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love the glass design of this candle along with the top, its so detailed and beautiful. this is a beautiful fresh scented candle. The Lavender and woodsy scent of this candle gives the most relaxing vibes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Perfect amount of fragrance smells divine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Volupsa candle is gorgeous!  The glass jar is very classy and the cap has a really pretty design. I surprisingly loved this scent, it's fresh and clean but very soft.  The scent fills up a really big room and burns slowly and evenly. The large size will last me a really long time.
The smell of this candle is so fresh and relaxing. Love to place this one next to my bath tub to create a luxurious and serene bath experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this beautiful candle!  It is the perfect, calming scent for my bedroom.  This is one I will definitely buy over and over again.  This fresh scent works for any time of the year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serene scent fills the room with a subtle hint of lavender, and if you close your eyes and breathe deeply you might envision yourself in a sunny field off somewhere in the woodlands of Provence.

This scent is very relaxing, and the smell of lavender is incredible. Its a good mix of woodsy/lavender thrown into the most beautiful jar! If you like a good clean smelling candle then I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this candle It was way more than I expected ! It smells so great and the glass candle cup was designed so perfect I love all the colors it had and just everything about this candle . Ver potent , strong beautiful smell !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!!!  Probably one of the best scents I've smelled in a while. It is rich yet subtle. Even without burning, the candle is able to make my bathroom smell so good. Definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_title: Different than expected-in a good way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The lavender is not the dominant scent, and it is a very nice surprise! I pick up more of the deeper woodsy scent that is mixed in. It's a clean smelling burn, and the light reflects beautifully on the light blue glass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to be reviewed. The packaging was really good and kept the product safe. The box was in another box and there was a lot of brown paper to keep the candle from breaking. The scent smells so good, kind of like a cologne musk.

I love lighting this candle in my bedroom as the lavender scent is so relaxing and soothing. It is perfect for my nighttime routine as a wind down from my day. Definitely recommend, such a beautiful scent!

A nice, clean fragrance- perfect for any room! I love this scent because it's not too heavy and works in every room of my house. This candle would also make the perfect gift, since it's a pretty universal scent that most people will love.

This scent is really clean-smelling. it's great in my bathroom and the candle carries the scent well. The lavender doesn't come through to me as much as the other scents, but the smell is still refreshing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect scent if you love fresh/soft scents! The lavender is so calming but not overwhelming. Perfect for the home to be lit year round! Love it! And the glass packaging is so beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Simple and soft scent. This will be the candle I want to gift to loved ones for the holidays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This candle smells amazing and has the most beautiful glass jar. It makes the perfect gift!
This fragrance smells so fresh and relaxing. It's not the typical lavender scent and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything lavender, but sometimes other candles can smell strong and synthetic and give me a headache.  This smells like real fresh lavender and is soft and delicate at the same time!  I really liked the bottle, it looks like a little gem and makes my house prettier and with a nice cozy smell!  thank you
I love this sent! I find it so light and soothing and love to burn it after a long day. It’s not at all overpowering, but fills the room with a really soft lavender sent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smell reminds me of my time at a 5 star Miami Beach hotel. They had a custom scent pumped into the lobby and it was so nice. This candle brings me back to that. Really well done frosted glass and quality wood top. Will for sure be a repeat buyer once I use this one up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This candle has a wonderful scent, is easy to light, and burns very cleanly. However, compared to most 3-wick candles I've used, it burns very fast. Since this is the first soy candle I've had, this may just be a feature of soy candles, I don't know. I work from home and usually light a candle in the morning in my office and let it burn all day.
Great new scent, very fresh and crisp - new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This one smells very nice.  Men don’t usually comment on scents, but even my husband said he would wear it as a cologne for himself lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the scent isn’t very strong, i love the packaging it’s very beautiful but i wish the scent was a little stronger and it doesn’t melt evenly after cutting the wick the right size. i do like the scent but again i wish it was a little stronger
My favorite Voluspa scent! The subtle lavender and fresh scents are perfect for any room in the house. The jar is a beautiful green, looks chic when it’s burning or just sitting on a counter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this candle! It’s light sweet and clean smelling. Makes my whole apartment smell glorious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is exactly what it smells like when you walk into an upscale resort. This scent is perfect for any room and the jar is elegant and timeless. The scent is calming, crisp, clean and very inviting. The lavender and wood-like tones make for a perfect blend and the fragrance throw can fill a room without being overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let’s start with the beautiful glass jar, its design goes so well with the lid, it just looks beautiful and lifts ups every corner you place it in.   This one is the French Cade Lavender, it’s a blend of wood, verbena and lavender that in all truth it smells like Gerlain’s Vetiver (a cologne which I am very fond of). I personally decided to use it only in the bedroom and even my husband said it said “really good” which is a lot of words coming from him. It changes the atmosphere of the place with that awesome and relaxing scent.  Thank you for this gorgeous product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fail-proof gift. It’s light, clean and is not overpowering with lavender scent. The packaging is gorgeous - Voluspa’s large jar candle jars also have an extremely long burn-time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I get compliments on this candle every time guests come over! It’s like actually being in the south of France! Burns super clean and lasts forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly, the packaging is stunning. It’s beautiful and is perfect as a gift. And since it’s a glass jar, it’s perfect for reusing. As for the fragrance, it smells almost like a soap bar and is a clean scent. The throw, however, is extremely lacking. For a good 10 minutes the only smell I got out of the candle was the smell of the wick burning. Even after the burnt wick scent was less prominent, the fragrance was quite light. I couldn’t really smell it at all and had to lean my nose literally right into the candle to smell anything. Overall, the packaging is lovely, but the pervasiveness of the fragrance is lacking. I’m not too sure if I’d purchase this for its fragrance only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this candle and scent! The jar is the perfect size and the color works in all seasons. The scent is a classic for my household. It truly smells like fresh lavender, without being over powering. Highly recommend this for a household staple.

This candle has got to be one of my favorite scents! The design of the jar is super intricate and the scent is extremely refreshing. The French lavender mixes perfectly with the French Cade Wood. Highly Recommend!

This candle is incredibly gorgeous with the intricate detailing on the jar. Makes for great decor. It smells heavenly too. Just the beautiful, clean, and fresh scent of lavender fills the entire room. It lasts as long as it says.  I had it burning for about 4 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Woody, bold, and refreshing all in one! I am not a big fan of anything lavender so I was skeptical but I was very pleasantly surprised by this one. The wood and lemon verbena balance out the usually overpowering lavender scent very well. Great scent pairings by Voluspa!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this candle!! The detail on the glass jar and lid is beautiful.  It is a pretty very light emerald aqua green color with some detail to the glass.  It looks beautiful on the counter or displayed in the home.  The candle itself has a slight clean smell with notes of French Cade Wood, Verbena & Bulgarian Lavender.   The overall candle does present a slight smell throughout the house where it is burning.

I received this French Cade Lavender Large Jar from Voluspa in exchange for my honest review. I think this candle smells really nice! I like the scent a lot and the candle jar is so beautiful! I definitely want to try more candle from this brand in other scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite candle scents! This makes a great home decor piece as well because the glass is very pretty. This would make a great gift because the burn time is so long. I would definitely recommend this for the holidays
This is a scent you cannot go wrong with. It's a win for any gift giving event, and it leaves a freshness and calm to the room it's burning in. Would absolutely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous and best smelling candle . My favorite lavender scent which is not overpowering or artificial. It burns evenly and will last long. I highly recommend this as i love the look of the candle and it is ideal for gifts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best candle I have used ever!!! Buy it, you won’t regret it! The fragrance just travels throughout my house and smells amazing! The quality is super amazing for a candle! 10/10
This is by far my favorite scent so far for a fresh and neutral smell! Perfect for a living room and it’s so potent, you don’t need anything else lit and this scent fills up the whole room!
Candle jar looks amazing… as always. Burns well and makes the room smell divine. Perfect balance of fresh lavender, light citrus, and soft woody notes. Lovely everyday scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This candle is beautiful. The glass jar is heavy and the lid is a lovely teal color. The candle itself smells nice but it's hard to pinpoint exactly what the smell is. I wouldn't say it's lavender or floral but maybe an elegant lavender scent. It's relaxing and I use it in my bathroom to create a spa-like feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my all-time favorite candles! The jar is beautiful, and the size is a perfect compliment on my coffee table. It has a very fresh scent that makes the whole room smell like a spa. I’ll definitely be coming back to this time and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this scent. It is fresh, bright and reminds me of the ocean. I have never had this colored jar before and it’s really pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this candle. It's clean, elegant, and warm. It envelopes the space it's in while maintaining a fresh, bright presence. I keep the candle in my kitchen as it's fairly neutral - friends always ask what it's called.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This candle is very elegant the French cafe lavender is a perfectly balanced scent, very fresh and clean but still musky. The scent quickly envelopes the whole room and lingers for awhile. A nice sized candle and should last a long time. The glass jar it’s in is beautiful, it’s a nice heavy glass with designs embossed all over. Definitely a top notch candle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very fresh and clean smell! The glass jar makes it look super luxurious! It doesn’t smell like lavender so don’t be confused, it’s more on the herbal, green and fresh side. But it’s not way to intense also. The smell lasts quite long. The main scent for me here is verbena and some greeny leaves. Oh, and it’s huuge!!!
This is one of my favorite smells. I had the smaller candle version, but very excited to have a larger one that will last longer. Overall fresh smell, and love the color of the jar.
Obsessed! So fresh and clean. Perfect for a Crisp early morning

Obsessed with this light, clean scent that is oh so calming and refreshing. The candle itself is gorgeous and I love the color palette used on the jar and lid. The quality of Voluspa candles are second to none—aesthetically beautiful, burns evenly and lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The fresh scent is so nice, great for a bathroom. The large jar lasts months. Beautiful jar for decor as well.
This scent is a 10/10. My boyfriend and I LOVE this scent. It’s perfect for any time of the year, especially when you have family over. A perfect candle to light when you have guests!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very nice scent and quality candle overall. I live the jar it looks so stylish and match my interior perfectly. long lasting and very nice not hard scent. in love with it. thanks Voluspa for this gift
I love the glass jar it came in- so pretty. The scent is light, fresh, and calming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This candle has such a relaxing and wonderful scent.  It throws the perfect mix of fresh lavender that doesn't overpower a room but noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent. I've never smelled anything like this before. It's fresh and light, yet captivating at the same time. I feel like I'm at a five-star resort or spa every time I light up this candle. Seriously, I cannot get enough of this smell.

Love this candle so much! The lid looks beautiful and elegant, so as the embossed glass jar. It smells little bit woody,  feels like the breeze of the summer night. The jar is 18oz big, which can last for a long time. Well worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i heard really good things about voluspa. This lavender Smell really helps me with my sleep! The rustic, woodsy and herbaceous Smell added with some lush lavender and French cade. The lemon Smell is not that strong But i really like how its a refreshing scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Voluspa is a brand I’m not too familiar with, but I’ve heard only great things from others around me. The first thing I noticed was the appearance of the candle itself. The glass jar has a very nice design and looks amazing anywhere! Lavender is a scent that I occasionally go for, and it’s a scent that I enjoy. With that, I thought that the candle smelled very nice and warm. Seeing the size of the candle, I know that it’ll last me a long time, and I look forward to burning it in the near future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this candle! It’s huge! First of all I have to admire beautiful packaging. It comes in the glass vessel with metal lid decorated beautifully. This candle is nice decoration for the room by itself. It smells like cedar wood and pine. Perfect for Christmas. I don’t smell mush if lavender though.

I’m a huge fan of candles, so I love this one! It has notes of lavender, verbena and wood. Smells amazing and perfect for cozy fall evenings. The jar is beautiful and I would deffinitely reuse it as a small vase or storage after candle is gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent! It smells like a man, but in the best way. I wish it was sold in a cologne! The packaging and jar is beautiful, and the candle burns beautifully. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These candles smell nice and look beautiful in your home, but they burn horribly. There was about a 3 inch ring of wax around the wick after burning only a few times. I even let it burn for hours to try and fix the problem. Half of the candle was wasted because I couldn’t burn it. Consider making the glass container shorter/wider! Maybe two wicks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite candle! Love the lavender smell. Calming yet cheering. I usually light it in the evening. Just for the relaxation

reviews.review_title: Would bathe in this scent if I could lol
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this smells absolutely amazing!! I am obsessed with it and wish I could bathe in it lol I hate candles that are so obnoxiously over scented. Like u take off the top and its so strong u have to put the cap back on. This is not that. It is not overwhelming at all. It smells fresh and clean and it burns really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this one. I have two others - Baltic Amber and Santal Vanille - BA doesn't smell like much at all, SV is a little better, but this one is amazing. I love it so much. It smells like a hotel by the ocean. It is making me happy <3
The wick was always so thin. Halfway through the candle stopped lighting because of wax pooling. I now can't even light this anymore. Avenger is great but quality is horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gave it to my friend as a birthday gift and she loves it. Smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I live in central/south Florida and am always a little nervous about ordering candles. Arrived safely and well-packed in late January. This is a very soapy clean scent. Works well in my vintage-inspired bathroom. If you get nostalgic over your grandma's scrubby clean soapy-smelling bathroom, this is for you. If you dislike soapy smells, this is not for you. This is not a typical essential oil lavender type scent. It is 100% nostalgic grandma soap. Burns evenly and has a medium throw. Stronger than the Nissho-Soleil scent. The jar is BEAUTIFUL. I plan to use it to store cotton after the candle is gone. I did not receive any samples with this order or my other Voluspa candle despite requesting them. Not a big deal, just letting others know to maybe not expect them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this candle as a gift for a parent. Great candle, love the packaging and the size. The lavender smell is not very strong with the cade definitely being the more overpowering scent. The candle has a great throw and can be smelled throughout the house.

reviews.review_title: Wick Isn't Long Enough to Stay Lit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is not my thing, but that isn't why I'm giving this candle a bad review. I didn't even trim the wick but it is not long enough to stay lit. I think it stayed lit for about 10 minutes before the melted wax snuffed out the flame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smell so good and the container is really luxe! Great value for this size. First time I bought from this company but will definitely not be the last time.
good scent but, not worth the money can get candles of much better quality for less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite Voluspa scent by far! I have many of these candles and I love them. I also use a lot of another candle brand that everyone loves (and so do I) but they're very smelly and sometimes you want a candle without an overpowering scent. If that's you Voluspa is your candle. I like to light this one while I take a bath and it gives the bathroom the perfect amount of lavender scent that I feel relaxed and not overloaded with scent. I will always have to have one of these candles for baths.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG!! Can we say peace in a jar!!! I am OBSESSED!!! It’s my all time favourite voluspa candle !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this scent as I love lavender. I will say the cade is extremely over powering over the lavender and almost smells like pine trees. As it is not December nor do I like my place smelling like trees, this is one of the worst smelling candles in their line. Kinda sad I hated it so much as I love Volupsa.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite scent. It smells a bit masculine when you first open the jar, but that melts into the beautiful lavender and case scents.  The jar is gorgeous. I like how it’s minimally labeled, so I’ll be able to repurpose the jar after the candle is gone.

reviews.review_title: A Very Intriguing Interpretation of Lavender
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This truly is an incredible lavender; I’ve found that it even resonates with people who say they don’t like lavender.  It’s a very fresh and clean floral. I was very pleased with the throw (it’s important that my candles fill a room with scent) although I did light another smaller French Cade candle alongside this 16 oz one.  Like all Voluspa products, this candle has longevity and it’s glass jar serves as pretty decor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the woody scent with a little bit fruity vibe. Last super long and worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent and these candles! Great subtle smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love this candle!!! the scent can get a tad too much sometimes (but my room is tiny so i don’t think it’d be an issue if it was bigger) but its beautiful. it also takes a decent amount of time to burn, so it’s definitely worth the price!

reviews.review_title: Amazing hot and cold throw and worth the cost
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Y'all, THIS SMELL!! It's clean and a little floral and a lot intoxicating. I don't understand the other reviews saying this candle has a light scent because that is not my experience. I have purchased plenty of those $10 Target soy wax candles, but I always come back to Voluspa. It is worth the price for three reasons: it fills your entire house with scent when lit; it burns evenly for 100 hours; and once it's done the jar makes an amazing vase/storage/whatever piece to keep. The cold throw on this candle is amazing as well - I just leave it open sometimes to enjoy the smell in the room. I even have an open (the no-lid, smaller version) in my bathroom to keep it smelling pleasant in there. I always get a hit of it when washing my hands or standing in front of my mirror. When burning, it does so evenly. When I have had tunneling with this candle it some how self-corrects after a few burns. I've gone through about 8 of these and never had one not finish evenly. This scent and brand is hands down my favorite candle that I will repurchase until I die. I'm serious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The French Cade Lavender candle is staple in our home! It has a refreshing crispness that is so smooth and beautiful. The scent reminiscent of a sunny summer morning seaside. The lively lavender notes are balanced with the French Cade Wood and Verbena creating a harmonious fragrance that has an excellent throw. This is the candle I like to light in the morning while I get my day started, it always leaves me feeling ambitious with a calm sense of peace.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful smell. Shattered glass during shipment.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance is wonderful; however, unfortunately the glass container was shattered upon arrival.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: little pricey, but glad i got it when it was on sale. light scented not too strong

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is way too mild. Barley can smell anything. When we can it’s lovely.

reviews.review_title: So happy Sephora has my favorite candle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so happy that Sephora carries my favorite candle now! This candle is my signature scent for my home. It's very different than any candle I've ever had. It is light but cozy and it is perfect at any time of the year. I'm glad that I can get points for buying it now!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a lovely candle. I love Voluspa candles because they are made of clean ingredients. The smells are great and burn a nice long time. Love the glass jar over the tins they look so classy. This scent is musky without being to intense. Lavender makes it soothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this scent so much that I’m buying more. I already have 2 of this size candle and a smaller one. I can’t get enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve loved Voluspa for years. Truly the finest candles made at any price! You will never be disappointed. The scents are complex and original. I’ve never found a scent of theirs that I didn’t immediately love.  Don’t hesitate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: YES!  SO happy Sephora is carrying this candle! My fave large jar
